name: Enzyme Magic® No Rinse Floor Cleaner
description: Enzyme Magic® - No Rinse Floor Cleaner Industrial strength cleaner for hard surfaces in restaurants. It contains a proprietary multi-enzyme formula designed to break down grease, oil, and food waste. Rather than merely pushing the soil around with soap, the multi-enzyme formula destroys the grease and grime. Naturally lifts grease from grout lines. Enzyme Magic® - No Rinse Floor Cleaner eliminates odors by destroying the organic matter. It does not just mask odors! No Deck Brushing! Mop & Go!!! It’s designed to discharge down the drain where the enzyme formula will continue to attack the grease and food waste and is a non-corrosive and safe for all surfaces not harmed by water.
